entities.name: soul
entities.description: The narrator describes 'soul' as something they wanted and grew stronger on.

entities.name: miss weasley
entities.description: Miss Weasley is described as someone the narrator is more powerful than.

relationships.description: The narrator fed Miss Weasley a few of their secrets, indicating that they were nourished by her fears and secrets.
The narrator poured some of their soul back into Miss Weasley.
